_header: Thou wretch ghost with mud I-dight
_description: The appeal of the dead to the passer-by — four lines

BLAdd11579.Transcription:
Þw wreche gost wid mud y detþync on me her in þys
                    petAman y was and mannes fereSwilc schalt þw ben as yc am
                    here
BLAdd11579.Attributed Title: De illis qui transeunt per cimiterium et nolunt orare pro defunctis
